Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
geometry.Rectangle
public class Rectangle extends Object
Class to represent the rectangle.

  • Method Details

    • getSide

      public Line getSide(int numb)
      Funt go get a side. Upper side is number 1, numbering is clockwise for other sides.
      Parameters:
      numb - the number of the requested side
      Returns:
      the side

    • intersectionPoints

      public List<Point> intersectionPoints(Line line)
      Func to get all the intersection points with a certain line.
      Parameters:
      line - the line
      Returns:
      Return a (possibly empty) List of intersection points

    • hit

      public Velocity hit(Point collisionPoint, Velocity currentVelocity)
      Func to get a new velocity after hitting the rectangle.
      Parameters:
      collisionPoint - the collision point of a hit
      currentVelocity - the velocity before the hit
      Returns:
      the new velocity
